OCD.name: AI
OCD.description: A wire component that allows to interact with Inference Engines to perform machine learning.

AD.name: InferenceEngineService Target Filter
AD.description: Specifies, as an OSGi target filter, the pid of the of the AI Inference Engine instance to be used.

AD.name: preprocessor.model.name
AD.description: Specify the model name to be used as a preprocessing step. Leave empty to bypass this step.

AD.name: inference.model.name
AD.description: Specify the model name to be used for the inference step.

AD.name: postprocessor.model.name
AD.description: Specify the model name to be used as a postprocessing step. Leave empty to bypass this step.
